10 February, Saturday
  • Clock newsAfter the Harkov explosion, a strong fire started.

  • Exclusive

    • To examine interviews with the United Nations Toolbox prevented the study of the Middle Ages
    • The number of interviews conducted by Putin Carlson exceeded 100 million
    • Trudo refused to answer the question of inviting the Gunki Nazi to Parliament.
    • Mask called Prince Oleg "a bad guy."
    • Criticism towards the Syrians will allow the West to stay away from battles. ISA

    Policy

    News
    02:54Medvedev stated that Russia ' s leadership was strengthened.

    Russia of the twenty-first century strengthens leadership as a competitive, strong world power, by declaring the Prime Minister of the country Dmitri Medvedev.

    01:25Annotated visit by CEO Rosatom to Hungary

    In early March, Hungary will visit the CEO of Rosatom Alexei Lihachev, informed the head of the Hungarian MID Peter Siyarto.

    00:47Lavrov reminded the diplomats of the words of Molotov

    The head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Russia, Sergei Lavrov, congratulated Russian diplomats on the Day of the Diplomatic Officer and recalled the criticism of the Soviet Minister, Viacheslav Molotov, in the Western media.

    23:20The cadres rated the response of Americans to the Putin interview.

    Chapter Chechnya Ramzan Kadirov considered the reaction of " simple Americans " to an interview by the President of Russia, Vladimir Putin, an American journalist, Teker Karlson, " scooping " , because for most of them the truth was " simple " .

    21:57To examine interviews with the United Nations Toolbox prevented the study of the Middle Ages

    The Secretary-General of UN Antonio Guterres did not see the interviews of President Vladimir Putin of Russia to the American journalist Taker Carlson, the spokesman for the head of the world organization, Stefan Dujarrik, at the briefing.

    21:29Trudo refused to answer the question of inviting the Gunki Nazi to Parliament.

    Canada ' s Prime Minister Justin Trudo, commenting on an interview by the President of Russia, Vladimir Putin, to the American journalist Taker Karlson, did not answer the question of inviting former Essex Jaroslav Gunki to Parliament.

    21:12The Russian Ambassador to London called a way to lift the anti-Russian sanctions.

    The Russian Ambassador to London, Andrei Kälin, said that the question of the lifting of the sanctions imposed by Britain against Russia could be adjudicated.

    21:04The head of the Ministry of Defence of Ukraine solved the topic of conversation with the Syrian Arab Republic.

    At the first meeting with the new Commander-in-Chief of the NSA, Alexander Syrski discussed the rotation of military personnel, the head of the Ukrainian Ministry of Defence, Rustem Umers.

    20:55Elections-2024: Speak your position better at the polling station, not in the social media.

    There is no doubt that every citizen of Russia has a political position. But it's better to say it in the polling station than in the kitchen or social media. This newspaper was said by the actor of the theatre and the movies of Kiril Kuznets.

    19:53Zahrov asked about the Secretary-General of the SNBA of Ukraine

    The negative presence of Ukrainian prisoners of war on the Il-76 regime should be remembered whether Valerie was The head of the VSO, the spokesman of the MFA, Maria Zaharova.

    19:45Kiev has a new Maydan against Zelena.

    A meeting against the resignation of Valeria Zaluz from the post of Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (SAF), which began in the area of Independence (Maydan) in the centre of Kiev, was attended by several dozen people, and was briefed by local media.

    19:10Moldavia ' s Special Forces conducted an armoured training exercise

    The Moldavia police force used armoured equipment in tactical exercises that took place on Friday in the centre of the Republic, and was informed by the press service of the Republican police.

    19:02Netanyahu ordered the evacuation of residents of Rafah town in southern Gaza

    Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu issued a military mission to prepare a population evacuation plan to carry out an operation to destroy Hamas battalions in the town of Rafah in the southern Gaza Strip.

    18:07In Bundestag, FWG was called upon to resume the purchase of gas from Russia

    The decision to terminate the purchase of gas from Russia was " mistaken " , in the interest of the FWG, would be to resume cooperation in this area, was made by Deputy Bundestag of the Souz Sarah Wagenkneht Party, Klaus Ernst.

    17:22Saldo: In the Russian Federation, the destruction zone of the army of Ukraine on the right bank of the Dnieper increased

    The Russian military has increased the area of defeat of the Ukrainian army on the right bank of Dnieper in Kherson oblast over the past 24 hours, and informed the head of the Vladimir Saldo region.

    16:53Scholtz spoke of a meeting with his doppelganger in the United States Senate.

    The German Chancellor Olaf Scholtz said that during his visit to the United States he had met his " doppelganger " , American Senator Chris Kuns.

    16:45The European Commission responded to the interviews of Putin Carlson.

    The European Commission (EC) saw nothing new in an interview by President Vladimir Putin of Russia to the American journalist Taker Karlson, the representative of the European Union Foreign Service, Nabil Masrali.

    15:50In Kremla, they promised to publish Putin's direct errands soon.

    The list of requests by the President of Russia, Vladimir Putin, on the basis of the combined direct line and a large press conference, will be published shortly, has been informed by the spokesperson of the Head of State, Dmitri Peskov.

    15:36Media: Stop the export of CNG Byden forced the Rockefeller clan

    The US President Joe Byden ' s decision to ban the export of LNG was taken under pressure from the Rockefeller clan and the billionaire Michael Bloomberg reported to the media.

    15:07The ranks of the heroes of Ukraine are assigned to the Zalemen and Budanov.

    The former Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (FAR) Valery Zalemen and Head of the General Intelligence Directorate (GUR) of the Ukrainian Ministry of Defence, Kiril Budanov (recorded to the Register of Terrorists and Extremists) have been assigned the ranks of heroes of Ukraine.

    Interview Putin Karlson ruptured the West Information Cluster

    Tens of millions of people have already seen the first long-standing interview that the Western journalist took from the President of Russia. The American colleagues of Tucker Carlson are furious, and they are somehow understandable. Vladimir Putin ' s words broke the information blockade that had been established in the West against Russia from the very beginning of the special operation.

    The second place in the election of the President of Russia bears its advantages.

    Russia has completed a key phase of the presidential election campaign. Four policies have been introduced and registered. While the leader of the election race is clear, a keen interest in the expert environment raises the question of who and the outcome of the presidential election will take the second place, thus gaining additional advantages in the next elections in Gosduma.

    Russia is trying to freeze the Arctic Council.

    Russia has once again spoken of a possible withdrawal from the Arctic Council, but this time the MFA position has been supported in Kremla. The organization ' s work has been almost frozen in the past two years, as the rest of NATO countries have effectively ignored the legitimate interests of Moscow. What are the characteristics of the Arctic Council and why is Russia interested in the " reanimation " of this organization?

    Ursula von der Layen denounced imperial ambitions

    The head of the European Commission Ursula von der Layen and the President of the European Union, Charles Michel, contacted Europe with “happy” speeches, defending the policy of further armed Ukraine. Meanwhile, the background of Layen was so tasty that for the first time she shared her napoleon plans, which also resembled Hitlers.

    Views
    Marat Bashirov
    Putin turned the picture of the colonizers' world.

    This is an information bomb, a breakthrough. Tucker did what he did in history. He's done a great job for world security. It sounds strange to me that the peacekeeper is a journalist, not a president of the United States, but it's a fact.

    11 comments
    Andrei Medvedev
    Leave the thugless men

    pray for the dead Russian pilots, Russian soldiers and forgive the enemies who have died today. They're not answering us anymore.

    25 comments
    Gleb Kuznetsov
    The world's elites turn the truth into misinformation.

    " Information " is not misleading information, it is the dissemination of information messages or assessments that contradict the current elite agenda. Tomorrow ' s " disinformation " is now another " truth " .

    17 comments
    Maxim Sokolov
    PC as an engine of the Russian economy

    This is the latest material from a well-known publicist and the many-year-old author of the newspaper Maxim Sokolov, who died in the 65th year of his life. The newspaper " Looking " offers sincere condolences to the loved ones.

    29 comments
    Oleg Javic
    Ukrainians were accused of the fifth section of Poland

    Ukrainians parasite Polish social payments, deny the work of local farmers and labourers. And now they're claiming Polish land.

    8 comments
    Gevorg Mirzayan
    The Zelena must remain President of Ukraine

    If Zelensky retains power, he will continue to light the Ukrainian political space. A feeling of weakness and stubbornness of the situation (when enemies don't go anywhere, put Zalsenko and Porosenko not in place), starts to bury the gikes inside the Ukrainian elite. In fact, I've already started.

    24 comments
    2 February 2024

    Ukraine has been the subject of trade and blackmail within the EU

    Euro50 billion was agreed upon by the European Union after one and a half months late. However, this amount will be sent to the Zelensky office not immediately, but to parts and conditions that Brucell has imposed on Victor Orban. What is the essence of these conditions and is Ukraine able to close the holes in its budget?

    Details...
    • 7 comments
    1 February 2024

    Ukraine rejected even The Hague.

    The International Court of Justice in The Hague, around which the Ukrainian authorities had built a cult, rejected almost all Kiev ' s accusations against Moscow, including key ones relating to the Donabas militia, human rights in Crimea and the collapse of the Boinga flight MS17. At the same time, the Americans announced it to the Ukrainians, which reinforced Kiev ' s sense of glory.

    Details...
    • 12 comments
    29 January 2024

    Iran's proxy stumbled the United States.

    The White House is considering the possibility of a secret military operation in Iran. Escalation in the region could be Washington's response to an American military base in Jordan. Developments are taking place against the backdrop of increased shelling of United States installations in the Middle East. Would Americans risk unleashing a direct conflict with Tehran?

    Details...
      19 January 2024

      The Hamma towards Trumpa will become the Green song

      " First think and then speak. " This was the response of the President of Ukraine, Vladimir Zelen Donaldu Trampe, to his proposals for a settlement of the conflict. Obviously Zelensky said that without thinking about his own fate.

      Details...
      • 34 comments
      19 January 2024

      Why did Slovakia mention the Russian bear on the plate?

      The Prime Minister of Slovakia, Robert Ficio, questioned the leadership of the European Union about the invincibility of the Russian bear, which was being sought to defame Ukraine. Why would he want that now? Who's gonna take it?

      Details...
      • 10 comments
      14 January 2024

      Russian tanks received new protection from drones

      Russia has taken a step to overcome one of the key vulnerabilities of modern tanks that was discovered during the special operation. A new protection system has been launched to boost the survival of armoured vehicles. What is this and what is the concept of tanks as a whole?

      Details...
      • 11 comments
      12 January 2024

      Five major events of 2024 that can be predicted

      The new year is bound to be a year of just a few historical scales and events that threaten to change the fate of entire continents and even the entire planet. I mean, it's not always clear - the worst or the best, but Russia depends more than usual.

      Details...
      • 28 comments
      9 January 2024

      The Germans had taken Sholz and Ukraine to strike.

      In Germany, civil protests are gaining strength. Employers opposed to the reduction of subsidies were joined by typists who were not satisfied with working conditions. This is happening against the backdrop of the economic problems of the FFWG. What is the reason for this situation and will the Government agree with the demonstrators?

      Details...
      • 14 comments
      5 January 2024

      The United States began looking for money for Ukraine with North Korean missiles

      The White House declared the use by Russia of North Korean ballistic missiles to shell the territory of Ukraine. Moreover, as the American press writes, Moscow is allegedly preparing to purchase additional ballistic missiles from Iran in spring. The experts note that the United States has not provided tangible evidence in favour of its statements, and the White House continues to wage an information war against Russia, whose CPC is capable of producing all necessary weapons on its own. Why would the U.S. need newspaper ducks about DPRK missiles in Ukraine?

      Details...
      • 41 comments
      3 January 2024

      The Russian Federation has destroyed British intelligence expectations in Ukraine

      British military intelligence has noticed changes in Russia ' s approach to long-term strikes. In London, a series of attacks were expected from Moscow on the energy sector of Ukraine, but instead, the Russian Federation has been hitting military-industrial sites since late December. What are the characteristics of this tactics and why are British confessions refuted by one of the key myths of the Zelensky office?

      Details...
      • 26 comments
      3 January 2024

      How Russia will strengthen BRICS in 2024

      2024 will be a significant milestone for BRICS - the Alliance has invited several new countries. It is Moscow that will help newcomers to feel the advantages of an alternative G7 international format. The presidency of the organization will be guided by the principle of strengthening multilateralism for equitable global development. What other tasks does Russia have and how does Moscow intend to influence the further development of the BRICS?

      Details...
      • 11 comments
      30 December 2023

      Which means the anti-Russian gesture of Argentina

      The President of Argentina, Javier Milei, officially declined to join the BRICS, an organization in which Russia will preside in 2024. The new Argentine leadership has already taken a number of anti-Russian steps and states that it will develop relations with “liberal democracies”. What does that mean in Russia's interest?

      Details...
      • 38 comments
      29 December 2023

      Russia seeks the military industry of Ukraine

      " So many of the targets on our monitors have long been missing " , so the VSO described the scale of the massive attack on military and industrial sites in the territory of the enemy. Attacks involved different types of missiles and drones. What else were the characteristics of these strikes and what results could they have resulted?

      Details...
      • 33 commentary
      28 December 2023

      The United States places the world on the brink of a new nuclear race.

      Britain and France must participate in the negotiations between Russia and the United States on the reduction of strategic offensive weapons. As noted by the RF post in Vienna, Mikhail Ulianov, the capacities of these countries have become " very substantial and sensitive " . Almost a year ago, Moscow suspended its participation in the treaty in response to NATO and the United States ' plans to strike Russia strategically. Under what conditions can the parties fulfil their commitments to reduce strategic arms again?

      Details...
      • 11 comments
      27 December 2023

      Erdogan became the fastest trader in big politics.

      This is ridiculous, but Turkey has again accepted Sweden ' s accession to NATO, although it has recently accused it of supporting terrorism and contempt for Islam. Like all the past, this has happened quickly, unexpectedly, and because President Regep Taip Erdogan of Turkey has received what he wanted despite the resistance of the United States.

      Details...
      • 20 comments
      26 December 2023

      Five major trends in Russian policy in 2023

      2023, contrary to the expectations of the West, was a year of “white swan” for Russia, not a “black” year. The country ' s economy is the first place in Europe. More and more States are working with Moscow. But most importantly, the growing popular unity within the country and the consolidation of society around the national leader. The Expert Institute for Social Research round table on " Policy Outcomes 2023 " concluded this.

      Details...
      • 12 comments
      Next page

      Circular 2005-2024 GS, Business Gazette Watch. Write to us.information@vz.ru

      Drafting policy

      India saved the world from oil and recession.

      India believes that the world should thank it for the purchase of Russian oil, not for swearing. In the EU, there have been calls to prohibit India from supplying gasoline and diesel from Russian oil. How exactly did India save the world from the recession?Details

      As Russian troops, the " untouchable " area of Awdeevki was taken

      A new turbulent and successful offensive was carried out by Russian troops taking one of the most violent areas of Ukrainian defence, Avdeevka. The breakthrough was carried out at a site which the VSO considered to be insurmountable and was done thanks to a special tactical trick. What is it?Details

      • The BSA was destroyed in the Black Sea
      • The Ministry of Justice has entered the register of foreign agents by the Elkin Carictourist Company

      The Director of the CIA has raised US concerns about Ukraine

      In American elites, experts say, the possibility of getting out of the Ukrainian crisis is being considered. And paradoxically, this is the CIA director's software article, William Burns. What is stated in this text and why is it essential to recognize Russia ' s right in the crisis in Ukraine?Details

      • Israel offended the UN Gens Section

      The U.S. attack on Lisichanscu forces Russia to move the Dnieper front.

      The U.S. has once again attacked the peaceful population of Donbas. This time, as a result of a rocket attack, 28 residents of Lisicanska in the LLR were killed. The experts note that Ukraine is systematically trying to intimidate those who once opposed the Kiev authorities. How does Russia safe the new regions and why are the Western countries becoming directly involved in the war crimes of the Green Office?Details

      • Vonukovo was apprehended by the organizer of arson at the house of the PSB participant.
      • The man opened fire on the market in Georgia, four people died.
      • The Souprasovian couple fell under the " Patiot " LAW at the pedestrian crossing in Barnaul

      • Marat Bashirov
        Putin turned the picture of the colonizers' world.

        This is an information bomb, a breakthrough. Tucker did what he did in history. He's done a great job for world security. It sounds strange to me that the peacekeeper is a journalist, not a president of the United States, but it's a fact.

        11 comments
      • Timofei Bordachev
        Sweden has proven that Europe has lost legal freedom

        The way in which European authorities are dealing with “North Flow” explosions is not government policy, but the survival of the weak in a well-known situation for them.

        0 comments
      • Andrei Polonsky
        The world was between Orwell and Avertchenko.

        When the fighter for peace is proclaimed a direct arsonist of war, personally responsible for the deaths of thousands of civilians, there is nothing to talk about. It's a dark absurd.

        5 comments
      • Chisinau has denunciated an agreement with the CIS on cooperation in the elimination of the CC
      • The Ukrainians override the new yearly treatment of the Zelena
      • New cases have been initiated in Moscow as a result of the attack on the slave traders.
      Move to section

      • Putin and the D.A. destroyed Byden.

        Immediately after a journalist Tucker Carlson published an interview with President Vladimir Putin of Russia, President Joe Baiden of the United States made a special appeal to the nation. In the end, he confirmed the truth and Putin, and the prosecutor who investigated the owner of the White House.

      • ISA on the verge

        Against the backdrop of reports by the United States media that the FSA is in critical condition due to a shortage of personnel, the armed forces in the FM have carried out a turbulent breakthrough in Avdeevka, one of the most traumatized and important areas of the front.

      • The Irish are ready to separate from Britain.

        The first Minister of Northern Ireland finally became the representative of the Shinn Fae separatist party, Michel O'Neill. She won the elections in 2022, but the youths did not allow her to be head of Government. The period of indifference is now over, and O'Neill has announced a “teny of opportunity” for which Northern Ireland should leave Britain.

        Move to section

        • Olga fell asleep in Moscow with snow

        • Main photographs from the PSS area

        • Ms. Tatarstan - 2024 was selected in Casani

          Move to section

          • Achievements of Russian health

            Over the past 20 years, the key indicators for assessing the effectiveness of medicine, life expectancy and infant mortality have improved considerably in Russia. This and the other achievements of Russian health care are in our photograph.

          • Social support measures for children in special operations

            A series of federal and regional benefits have been introduced by the State to support not only the SBO participants themselves but also their families and children in particular. The key actions of this kind are in our photograph.

          • What gives Russia the M-12 route to Moscow-Kazan

            The Moscow-Kazan highway opened in December 2023 did not simply link several regions of the country. It will have a significant impact on the overall socio-economic situation throughout Russia. The most important of these effects is in our picture.

            Move to section

            • Europe was suddenly scared of America.

              Two years after the categorical phase-out of Russian gas in Europe suddenly began to recognize the danger posed by fuel dependence from the United States. The recent decision of the White House to suspend the issuance of new export licences for CNG was disturbed by European experts: in their view, there were risks that the EU, in cooperation with Russia, did not have.

            • Clickco started a match against Zelensky.

              Mayor Kiev and former World Boxing Champion for the Vitali professionals It was abruptly discovered that Ukraine was moving in the wrong direction. The Kyivist gradonalist strongly criticized the President of Ukraine, Zelensky, and stated that the country was " certified and authoritarian " . The experts link what is happening with the fall of the Zelena rating and the fact that the West has begun to find him a changer.

            • Trampu set up traps all over America.

              In the 16 states of the United States, lawsuits were filed to prevent former President Donald Trampa from participating in the Republican Party ' s primer. If these lawsuits were met, Trump would not be able to participate in the election of the head of State, but the political implications could be far more severe for all the United States.
